item.title: [PI] Mod icon problem TuT (noob friendly)
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

Okay so alot of you have been having the problem with the 317’s when you whisper someone and your mod icons are wrong !

For example your a mod and you whisper someone and they can see a donor icon instead of the mod icon.

Well in this tutorial i will tell you how to fix this really annoying problem !!!

Firstly you want to open Client.Java (Client sided)

Then you want to search for @cr1@ if you dont know how to search its Ctrl + F

keep going down untill you see something like this

if(l21 == 4) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr0@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 0) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr2@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 2) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr1@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 1) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr0@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else { pushMessage(s9, 3, TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } } catch(Exception exception1) { signlink.reporterror("cde1"); }

okay this is This area of the coding shows u about pming and the icons that it will show.

to explain this more if you see } else if(l21 == 1) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr0@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); this shows that playerRights 1 has a donor crown

So now its time to fix this

okay so starting back with this if(l21 == 4) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr0@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 0) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr2@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 2) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr1@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 1) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr0@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else { pushMessage(s9, 3, TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } } catch(Exception exception1) { signlink.reporterror("cde1"); }

to fix the problem just change the icons to the players rights

you should end up with something like this. if(l21 == 4) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr0@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 3) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr2@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 2) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr2@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else if(l21 == 1) { pushMessage(s9, 7, "@cr1@" + TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } else { pushMessage(s9, 3, TextClass.fixName(TextClass.nameForLong(l5))); } } catch(Exception exception1) { signlink.reporterror("cde1"); }

And then save the client.java complie and then run your server and your pm will now be fixed

Credits go to me for finding this out releasing it and spending 30 min to type this out

HOPE THIS HELPS !!!

Read full topic
